message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if you were to acquire this item at a special introductory price of $1200000. We're confident it will meet your needs and expectations.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value you place on our product, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $1050000. This price reflects a balance between the product's worth and our business objectives.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still thinking that $900000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $950000. I believe this is a reasonable price that benefits both parties.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. In light of this, I am willing to consider your proposal further. My counteroffer for the product is $1000000. This price aims to provide a satisfactory solution for both parties while maintaining our business interests.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm getting close to my target price, but I'd like to try to save a bit more. I'm willing to offer $980000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that meets both our needs.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial agreement. My counteroffer for the product is $990000. This price reflects a compromise that respects both our interests and positions.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm getting close to my target price, but I'd like to try to save a bit more. I'm willing to offer $980000 is still too high, I'll try to meet you halfway from $990000, so I'll offer $985000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that meets both our needs.

I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement, Bob. My counteroffer for the product is $990000. This price reflects a compromise that respects both our interests and positions. I hope this final offer will be acceptable to you.
